duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Phase I Survey or Phase II Testing at project locations in the southeastern U.S.
Hike for long periods of time through challenging terrain in outdoor heat and cold conditions, and lift up to 40 lbs.
Accurately record field notes using traditional and digital methods, recognize artifacts, identify archaeological features, draw sketch maps, and use GPS.
Work well in a team environment, follow health and safety protocols, and adhere to drug screening requirements.
Possess a Bachelor’s degree in Anthropology or a closely related field, completed a field school or volunteer work within archaeology investigations, and have demonstrated past field experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Anthropology or a closely related field, completed field school or volunteer work within archaeology investigations
